entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
